short_summary: ALS 5 Trailer Zodiac Hurricane 472. 2 bids received
full_summary:
===============

# Request for Proposal (RFP) - Boat Trailer for Zodiac Hurricane 472

**Reference Number:** cb-7733-67228236

**Amendment Number:** 8

**Solicitation Number:** W8476-246771/A

**Publication Date:** 2023-08-15

**Closing Date and Time:** 2023-10-26T14:00:00

**Project Overview**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers to provide five (5) boat trailers for Zodiac Hurricane 472. The delivery locations are:

* Halifax, NS
* Winnipeg, MB
* Dundurn, SK
* London, ON

**Contract Period**

The contract is expected to commence on 2023-11-28 and expire on 2024-03-31.

**Tender Status**

This tender is **Expired**.

**Procurement Details**

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

**Evaluation Criteria**

The proposals will be evaluated based on **Lowest Price**.

**Language**

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers in either official language of Canada. Documents may be submitted in either official language.

**Submission Requirements**

* **Electronic Receipt of Bids:** Electronic submissions will be accepted only.
* **Email:** [DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca](mailto:DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca)

**Contact Information**

Contact Brian James for more information at [brian.james3@forces.gc.ca](mailto:brian.james3@forces.gc.ca) or (819) 939-3299.

**Attachments**

Refer to the attached documents for more information: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/14295/en-rfp-w8476-246771-a---amendment-003---original.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/14295/en-rfp-w8476-246771-a---amendment-003---original.pdf) and others.

Please note that the contractor used different terms for the same thing, for example "Amendment Number" is not clear, in such cases, I rephrased for the
